Package com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DirectoryChangeHandler
    When the DirectoryWatcher detects a change to a directory it is watching it calls back to this class.
    DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender
    An interface for sending directory snapshot notifications.
    DirectoryWatcher
    Defines the interface to the directory watcher component.
    ReplicationSource
    Interface defining a replication source.
    ReplicationSourceFactory
    Interface defining a replication source.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectorySnapshotHandler
    This class manages a directory watcher.
    FileReplicationSource
    Implements a file based replication source.
    FileReplicationSourceFactory
    Implements a file based replication source.
    InetReplicationTarget
    Implements a socket based replication target.
    InetReplicationTargetFactory
    Implements a socket based replication target.
    LogsReplicationServer
    Entry point to the logs replication server.
    LogsReplicationServerHandler
    Implementation of the replication server.
    PollingDirectoryWatcher
    Detects and reports changes in a set of directories by polling the directories.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileMismatchException
    Exception raised when there is an exception closing.
    ReplicationServerException
    Exception raised when there is an exception closing.
